Text: Taku Defid ra bo̩ Nayo̩t e-Rama te̩, oñ i lewa o̩gba Jo̩natan, i kakini, E̩wñ omi che ta? Udu e̩wñ omi fe̩? E̩wñ la chʼadure kʼu ta eju ata-we̩ kʼi atene oji-mi taa?
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, E-le̩ ame̩rʼuwe̩ n; uwe̩ aku n. Go, ata-mi jʼache e̩wñ re tʼe-ki nana n, chai e̩gba kʼi ji tʼumi eti; e̩wñ chi kʼata-mi adʼe̩wñ-i maja ñwu mi? O̩da, i chʼabe̩le̩ n.

Taku Defid ño̩ go̩ mʼo̩, oñ i kakini, Ata-we̩ chema nyo̩nyo̩ kʼe̩ li mi eju; oñ i kakini, Me̩ ki je̩ ñwu Jo̩natan ma n, tode̩gba kʼe̩do̩-wñ akpabie̩; i muda chʼochochi, oji Jihofa, kpai oji onugo-we̩ ge̩, i bo e̩re̩ okate kʼu nachi kʼu nanyʼef uku.
Taku Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, E̩wñ du ki dʼe̩do̩-we̩, e-le̩ nache todu we̩.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Jo̩natan kakini. Go, ochu ane̩ o̩na, i la nʼo̩na kʼomi awe guguane̩ aje̩ e̩wñ kpʼonu n. Uwe̩ ki muda je̩ ñwu mi lo kʼu dʼo̩la-mi maja oko gbogbo nyʼolane̩ o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ.
Iche̩wñ kʼata-we̩ tene mi re, mak e̩ ka ñw u kakini, Defid gbo̩ko̩bʼumi eju e̩kpa eju e̩kpa kʼi ra nyi Be̩tle̩he̩m, ewo-wñ; todu iche̩bo̩ ku ma che o̩do̩ o̩do̩ tod abunyi-wñ lewane̩ me̩.
Iche̩wñ kʼi ka abe̩-i kakini, I nyo̩ gbe̩; mak adu-we̩-i anure̩do̩: i muda che̩wñ kʼe̩do̩-wñ kpa nana, mak uwe̩ ki ma ka kʼi fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ñwa te̩ kʼi ache.
Todule̩ e̩ namo̩la ñw adu-we̩-i; todu uwe̩ je̩ ñw adu-we̩-i chʼalo e-Jihofa kpʼuwe̩: i muda che̩wñ kʼudu kʼu fe̩ dʼef umi, uwe̩ onugo ki dʼumi kpa; todu e̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ adʼumi nyʼugbo ata-we̩?
Taku Jo̩natan kakini, E-le̩ ki jiji rʼuwe̩; todu iche̩wñ kʼomi ma ma re̩ ka kʼata-mi fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ ñwa nyʼuwe̩, omi ma ka ñw e̩ n?
Taku Defid ka ñwu Jo̩natan kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼata-we̩ mʼohi o̩ko̩ko̩ du ñw e̩ fa, e̩ne̩ aka ñwu mi?
Taku Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Lewa, kʼa nyʼoko o̩mo̩. Tak ama meji le tʼoko le̩.

Taku Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Jihofa O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l! E̩gba kʼu natʼo̩wo̩ nyʼata-mi efu dabe̩ne̩ kʼiko-i o̩na, abe̩k o̩to̩na, go, iche̩wñ kʼe̩nyo̩ do̩mo̩ ñwu Defid, omi akpe̩ one̩ wa adʼoji-wñ dufu ñw e̩ n?

Iche̩wñ ki rʼata-mi eju kʼi achʼuwe̩ e̩bie̩ne̩, kʼomi ma du dufu ñw e̩, kʼu fʼuwe̩ ke̩che̩ alo, kʼuwe̩ ki lo kpʼure̩do̩ n, maku Jihofa ki fʼabe̩le̩ che ñwu Jo̩natan, kpai e-ki tʼe-i le ge̩: Jihofa ki la dʼugbo-we̩ alu kʼi te̩te̩dʼugbo ata-mi.
I la chʼabu kʼu deju-i kate oñ uwe̩ adʼufe̩de̩nyo̩ Jihofa ña mi kʼu we eku ofo n;
uwe̩ ki ño̩ kʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-we̩ da bʼunyi-mi te̩ ogbegbele̩ n; e̩ ki che n, dagba i chʼadiko e̩gba ku Jihofa fʼame̩nebi Defid okoke ko̩da bʼeju ile̩-i te̩.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩natan chʼalo kpai abunyi Defid kakini, Jihofa la atene ef o̩wo̩ ame̩nebi Defid.
Taku Jo̩natan je̩ ñwu Defid ño̩ go̩ ge̩, iugbo efe̩do̩ kʼi afe̩do̩ owñ; todu i fe̩do̩ owñ alu kʼi afe̩do̩ onugo o̩la-wñ.
Taku Jo̩natan ka ñw u kakini, Ochu ane̩ o̩na, ma atene we̩ chuu, todu e̩wñ ugugu-we̩ ate̩ ofo.
Oñ e̩gba kʼe̩ fʼo̩jo̩ me̩ta je̩ tak uwe̩ ki hika gwo̩ru nyʼugbo kʼe̩ dʼo̩la-we̩ maja o̩jo̩ kʼo̩la le̩ chi, kʼe̩ la kwogugu ugbo okuta Eze̩l le̩.
Tak u natʼo̩fa me̩ta lʼo̩wo̩ʼka-wñ, dabe̩ne̩ kʼu najuko.

E̩ la go, nafʼimo̩to̩-mi kpe̩, oñ naka ñw u kakini, Lo kʼe̩ tene o̩fa le̩ wa. Iche̩wñ kʼu naka ñw imo̩to̩ okolobia le̩ kakini, Go, o̩fa le̩ dʼejemi ñw e̩, mak e̩ mʼu du kʼe̩ lewa; todu ure̩do̩ i che ñw e̩, i nʼo̩la n, oji Jihofa.
I muda che̩wñ kʼu ka ñw okolobia le̩ abe̩-i, kakini. Go, o̩fa dʼejo̩gba-we̩ o̩mo̩; mak e̩ lo we̩, todu Jihofa je̩ ñw e̩ kwʼemi.
I la chʼe-o̩la kʼomi kpʼuwe̩ ka le̩, go, Jihofa dʼagbagba-mi kpʼuwe̩ ogbegbele̩.
Abe̩le̩ Defid dʼo̩la-wñ maja oko le̩. Oñ e̩gba kʼochu ne, onu kwoguane̩ kʼi jʼuje̩wñ.
Onu la gugu oji akpa-wñ alu kʼi te̩tache, owñ chʼakpa ki dʼo̩lo̩do̩ le̩; Jo̩natan la dago o̩mo̩, oñ Abina gugu akolo So̩l; uña Defid la te̩ ofo.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ So̩l kʼabu du o̩jo̩ le̩ n: todu i do̩ kakini, E̩wñʼka ke̩re̩bʼo̩ kʼo̩la-wñ ma fe̩ n le̩; o̩la-wñ fe̩ n de̩.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ñwa ochu etito̩, o̩jo̩ ekeji-wñ, kʼuña Defid la te̩ ofo ta. Taku So̩l ka ñwu Jo̩natan o̩ma-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼo̩ma Je̩si ma wa je̩ e̩wñ n? Tʼo̩nale̩ tʼeñini, i wa n.
Taku Jo̩natan dohi ñwu So̩l kakini. Defid tʼumi ene eju e̩kpa eju e̩kpa kʼi nyi Be̩tle̩he̩m:

i la kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi lo, todu abunyi-wa chenʼiche̩bo̩ ku ma che ef ewo le̩; o̩maye-mi la fʼuko̩ te̩ ñwu mi. Fa-i, i la che̩wñ kʼe̩ li mi eju, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi lo kʼu fejudʼamo̩maye-mi. E̩wñ ki chi kʼi ma wʼugbo itebulu onu ni de̩.
Tak uwe̩do̩ So̩l mutajo bu Jo̩natan ma, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩, o̩ma onobule̩ ki ma mʼofane̩ n. Omi ma kʼo̩ma Je̩si kʼe̩ fa mʼo̩la le̩ amud anyo̩ ñw e̩ n? kʼi ñʼamud anyo̩ ñw ago ofo e-iye-we̩ n?
Todu gbogbo abu kʼo̩ma Je̩si le̩ deju ile̩-i, uwe̩ anʼe̩re̩ ane̩ n, kpʼo̩fe̩-we̩ n. Todule̩ e̩ ki fʼone̩ kpe̩ amʼu du wa ñwu mi fa-i, todu e̩nuku i che.
Taku Jo̩natan dohi ñwu So̩l ata-wñ kakini, E̩wñ chi ku ma adʼu kpa? Ab i che taa?
Taku So̩l fʼo̩kwo̩ ro̩ ñw u kʼi dʼu kpa; lugbo e-le̩ Jo̩natan ma ka kʼata-wñ fuñwa tʼe̩do̩-wñ ka kʼi adu Defid kpa chuu.
Abe̩le̩ Jo̩natan we̩do̩ nana oñ i kwane̩ bʼitebulu te̩, i la jʼuje̩wñ du o̩jo̩ ekeji ochu le̩ n, todu e̩do̩-wñ kpabie̩ todu Defid, todabu kʼata-wñ kʼanyo̩ mʼo̩.
Oñ i lewatʼodudu-wñ, Jo̩natan nyʼoko le̩ iko kʼi da ñwu Defid, imo̩to̩ kekeleʼka la dʼugbo-wñ.
Tak i ka ñw imo̩to̩-wñ le̩ kakini, Fule, kʼe̩ tene o̩fa kʼu nata-i. Oñ abu kʼimo̩to̩ le̩ fule alo i fʼo̩fa ta lʼo oji.
Tak e̩gba kʼimo̩to̩ le̩ lewʼugbo kʼo̩fa ku Jo̩natan ta te̩, Jo̩natan kwado̩ imo̩to̩ le̩ kakini, O̩fa le̩ dʼej o̩gba-we̩ o̩mo̩ n?
Oñ Jo̩natan kwado̩ imo̩to̩ le̩ kakini, Hio̩ane̩ piopio, e̩ ki che̩du n. Tak imo̩to̩ Jo̩natan mʼo̩fa le̩ re, oñ i lewa ugbo odu-wñ.
Imo̩to̩ le̩ la ma oji e̩wñ le̩ du n; chai Jo̩natan kpai Defid kate mʼoji o̩la le̩.
Taku Jo̩natan mʼebije o̩gu-wñ ko ñw imo̩to̩-wñ le̩, oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ mʼe̩wñ-i ko nyʼef ewo.

Tak e̩gba kʼimo̩to̩ le̩ le, ababa le̩ Defid kwane̩ kwʼugbo kʼi de̩ o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ o̩mo̩, oñ i lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma, oñ i dojikane̩ onu me̩ta. Taku ma dʼalu kʼomune̩ alu oñ ma chane̩ eraku kpai o̩la-ma, gbogbo tak e-Defid tabale.

Oñ Jo̩natan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Lo kpai ure̩do̩, todabu kʼawa mejeji go̩ ef odu Jihofa kakini, Jihofa adʼagbagba omi kpai uwe̩, kpai agbagba ugbe-mi kpai ugbe̩-we̩ tʼogbegbele̩. Tak i kwane̩ oñ i le owñ, oñ Jo̩natan la letʼef ewo.
